name: War Games: Pirates Versus Ninjas - A 2 player and Multiplayer Combat Game Deluxe
name_original: War Games: Pirates Versus Ninjas - A 2 player and Multiplayer Combat Game Deluxe
description:
This is the best and most popular 2 player game in the app store! Better than Tetris!

Rated best 2 player game by GameQuest!

Game play is addictive says Mobile GameTech!

Play against family and friends on the same device! Or play by yourself!

Up in the middle of the night? Be entertained!

Features:
- Quick games allow for fun on the go
- 2 Player mode allows for endless 1-on-1 gameplay
- Challenging 1 Player mode
- Plenty of game play options
- Unlock characters in 1 or 2 player mode
- A deluxe version of Pirates Versus Ninjas - no advertisements and membership in the PvN charter club!


*** Simple to play quick strategy game for quick bursts of fun!***
